Others: The Texas Rangers have won 10 of their past 13 games and are playing their best baseball since the early part of the season.
The Rangers are 7.5 games back in the AL West and 6.5 games back of the final Wild Card berth with 18 games remaining.
The Rangers have trimmed 2.5 games off the divisional lead held by Houston since August 27.
The Rangers swept the Chicago White Sox on July 25 but then lost nine of 12 games after that.
Pitcher Andrew Heaney hopes his teammates would play 'loose and free' for the final month.
Josh Smith believes the return of third baseman Josh Jung has made a difference, especially now that he is fully healed from the wrist injury that shelved him for four months.
Marcus Semien hit a leadoff home run in Sunday's win.
